qas.question: It was considered Europe needed what country?

context: These were <a0_0>fighting words<a0_0/> to be coming from a country that once insisted Europe needed <a1_0>Turkey<a1_0/> and was willing to spill blood over it. For his authority Miller invokes the people, citing <a2_0>the "collective wisdom" of Europe<a2_0/>, and introducing a concept to arise many times in the decades to follow under chilling circumstances:
